note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices. Depending on the country and year, it relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Share living on less than $6.85 a day vs. mean income or consumption
subtitle: The poverty line of $6.85 per day is set by the World Bank to be representative of the definitions of poverty adopted in upper-middle-income countries. This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.

display.name: Mean income or consumption per day
